data.message: ok heres a rhyme- wickedness shifting earthquakes, chasing after chasms, hunting caskets, the heart of this earth soil, put thru attack spinning spasms. for what you say is rifle rivalry, intergrating silencing the lambs, bath will - i will reap havoc to sup malencholy gone, because your presence is drawing out my breath drying out my soul that which wets my bones sweeping boneless savage skins. out of yahhawah nostrils i will blow you to the chaff and vaporize you let the air oxygen._ you can have this get bizzy bone to ryhme it because its meant to go fast you and damian marley add to it get beats from busta if i cant bob to it then its ruined i wrote this years ago to a bigger piece i forgot, if not then just give it to jay and beyonce
